Class ib_FilterFBM

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ib_a_Ops

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    z_BufferedImageOp, Cloneable

    public class ib_FilterFBM
extends ib_a_FilterPoint
implements Cloneable
    A filter which produces textures from fractal Brownian motion.
